mapper.insert: insert into reply (rno, bno, replytext, replyer, rreproot, rrepstep, rrepindent) values ((select NVL2(max(rno), max(rno)+1, 1) from reply), #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{rreproot}, #{rrepstep}, #{rrepindent})
mapper.select: select * from reply where bno=#{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.update: update reply set replytext=#{replytext}, updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
